title: Beats, Rhymes & Life (2011) 720p iTunes (Tribe doc)
description:
Beats, Rhymes & Life: The Travels of a Tribe Called Quest (2011)

DESCRIPTION:
10 years after breaking up, pioneering rap group A Tribe Called Quest reunites on tour, where tensions flare over unresolved issues. (with audio commentary from Director Michael Rapaport)

SPECS IN BRIEF:
M4V file for iTunes/iDevices
V: 1280x720 23.98fps h.264 @ ~3550kbps
A: 160kbps 2.0 AAC & 384kbps 5.1 AC-3 / 96kbps 2.0 AAC (Commentary)
S: English (non-SDH)

SOURCE:
Retail Blu-ray Disc

PLAYBACK:
Encoded & tagged for iTunes and Apple devices (iPad, iPhone 4, etc) that can handle HD video, including *both* versions of the AppleTV set top box.
